recipesJson.name: Bombshell
recipesJson.author: VaporVixen
recipesJson.description: This is a great ripe fruity summer vape with a lot of flavor! I have quickly turned it into one of my ADV. I made it for a girlfriend who is a big fan of pineapple. She wanted to be on a beach somewhere & this is what I came up with. I hope you enjoy <3

reviews.text: Excellent summer vape! I love the way all the flavors mingle and you can still pick them out. Very nice balance for a fruit blend. I will say I did not mix this 1:1, I sub'd the CAP Sweet Guava for FLV Pink Guava @ 0.5% and I can see where your iteration is probably better. Very nice work!
